```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load libraries
```{r message=False}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(scales)
library(ggmap)
```
Read in shapefile using sf and look at part of it
```{r}
ak_regions <- read_sf("shapefiles/ak_regions_simp.shp")
plot(ak_regions)  
```
